item.description:
The Full moon is 745 on March 27th. The weather is as good as it's gonna get. It shouuld be a good night for a walk. I hope to see you there !

 

I got this idea from the Friends of the Myles Standish group. I'm just going to do the Reservoir hike because it will be dark and I know that trail best.

The Exact day will be determined the week before so we can get a better indication of the weather. If the nights are clear mabye we'll do 2 nights.

This was a great time. I hope many of you can join us.

Please dress for the weather.

Bring a flashlight. Nothing too bright.

 

The Apres-hike festivities will be TBD.

It's about a 5 mile loop.

FYI - the moonrise calender

http://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/astronomy.html?n=2406&month=1&year=2013&obj=moon&afl=-11&day=1
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet at the bath house. Half way down the public beach.

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Full Moon Hike on Long Beach Plymouth
